title: PH60301: Nuclear Many Body Physics - Quick Facts
text:

Course name | Nuclear Many Body Physics
Offered by | Physics
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Symmetries and group theory in nuclear physics. Models of nuclear structure : nuclear matter, surface deformations and vibrations. Rotating nuclei. More general collective motion. Interacting boson models. Giant Resonances. Microscopic models : independent particles model. N-N interaction. Effective interactions. Spherical shell model. Deformed shell model. Variational models. Relativistic Mean Field approach. Interplay of single particle and collective motion.
